definition: to pile up/to heap up/a mass/pile/heap/stack/large amount

sentences.english: Leonid Brezhnev and PW Botha are consigned to the dustbin of history.
sentences.chinese: 勃列日涅夫和博塔都被扔进历史的垃圾堆中。

sentences.english: Made from cellulose, this shrink-wrap decomposes in a few weeks in a compost rubbish or in an industrial composter .
sentences.chinese: 由纤维素，这拆封分解在数周或垃圾堆肥在工业堆肥。

sentences.english: We should dump this obsolete concept to the historical rubbish-heap.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该把这种过时的理念扔进历史垃圾堆。

sentences.english: The kid scavenged on the rubbish heap, trying to salvage something useful or valuable.
sentences.chinese: 这小孩子们在垃圾堆上搜寻着可以变卖的废物。

sentences.english: The organic matter content of oversized compost in screen was higher than that of undersized compost in the maturity compost.
sentences.chinese: 腐熟垃圾堆肥筛分后的筛上物有机物含量高于筛下物。

sentences.english: The aimed to study the effects of composted refuse on the soil chemical characters .
sentences.chinese: 研究垃圾堆肥对矿区复垦土壤化学性状的影响。

sentences.english: They are picking over the cinders in the rubbish heap for unburned pieces of coal.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在检查垃圾堆中的煤渣，拣出未烧掉的煤块。

sentences.english: Do I leave them here, or bag them up and throw them in the trash?
sentences.chinese: 把她们留在这里，还是把她们装进袋子丢入垃圾堆？

sentences.english: The boy scrabbled about in the garbage for food.
sentences.chinese: 这饿极了的猫正在垃圾堆里找吃的。

sentences.english: Our chairs were street scores, the gifts of garbage night.
sentences.chinese: 我们的椅子都是在街边捡回来的，垃圾堆之夜的馈赠。

sentences.english: Reducing what goes into the landfill will reduce the amount of greenhouse gas that is emitted.
sentences.chinese: 减少进入垃圾堆的东西将会减少产生的温室气体数量。

sentences.english: The world has been too quick to dismiss the U.
sentences.chinese: 这个世界太早将美国扫进垃圾堆。

sentences.english: Slope stability including slope stabilization of landfilling area and waste body.
sentences.chinese: 边坡稳定包括填埋库区和垃圾堆体的边坡稳定。

sentences.english: In fact, Earth's largest 3)landfill isn't on land at all.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，地球上最大的垃圾堆填区根本就不在陆地上。

sentences.english: Garbage compost was studied for its fertilizer effeciency and soil improvement in red soil region.
sentences.chinese: 研究了在红壤地区垃圾堆肥的肥效及改土效果。

sentences.english: For one Mumbai landfill, the choice has been made.
sentences.chinese: 孟买的一个垃圾堆场已经作出了选择。

definition: rubbish bin/trash can/garbage can/Taiwan pr. [le4 se4 tong3]
trash/refuse/garbage/(coll.) of poor quality/Taiwan pr. [le4 se4]
